item.title: Ride Lobo Ride - UPAF Ride For The Arts 2012
item.description: Over quarter of a million participants have taken part in annual United Performing Arts Fund (UPAF) Ride for the Arts since 1981. According to UPAF, which provides financial support to 36 beneficiary groups, the ride helps keep the performing arts scene dynamic and a vital part of the community's culture and that they are among the nation's largest united arts funds in terms of dollars raised and number of donors.
